price: Na wͻn a wͻ’yii boniayε na wͻ’faa Yε’nsεm no atorͻsεm no, saa nkorͻfoͻ no ne Amanehunu gya no mu foͻ no.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
